title: [Dynamic Regions] Region split removes records unexpectedly
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

Region split drops removed_records unexpectedly 

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

v7.0.0

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

1. Add a peer.
2. Remove a peer.
3. Split region.

### What did you expect?

`removed_records` is kept.

### What did happened?

`removed_records` is dropped.
